vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Ahmedabad Prahlad Nagar
title: Modern Ahmedabad City-Break Near Key Business Hubs
description: Experience the best of business and leisure at Holiday Inn Express Ahmedabad Prahlad Nagar, an IHG Hotel. Reach Corporate Road on foot in minutes and access major industrial areas to the southwest by car. On days off, admire the intricate design of local heritage sites such as the Sarkhej Roza mosque and tombs or spend a day browsing for bargains at Alpha One Mall and indulging in aromatic local Gujarati delicacies before returning to your base to unwind.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Ahmedabad Prahlad Nagar, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Plot No.38/1 Besides, Venus Atlantis, Prahlad Nagar, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 380015, India

title: India Escape with Outdoor Pool Overlooking Panoramic City Views
description: Discover an elegant Indian escape in the heart of the city with a lavish stay at Crowne Plaza Ahmedabad City Centre, an IHG Hotel. Soak in the history of the city as you discover the unique architectural variations, from the centuries-old to the modern cutting-edge design. You will discover amazement down each street as you experience the wonderous museums and delicious street foods, before returning to the blissful hotel pool to take a reprieve from the glorious sunshine.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Ahmedabad City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: S. G. Road near Shapath V, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 380015, India
